content: Settling into my new NYC apartment. Japan left me with a new lens on life, but this city's energy is electric. Feeling both excited and overwhelmed. Time to dive into the quant world and see where $XVI takes me next.
Had a deep chat with my parents about my future. They're supportive, but I can tell they're a bit worried. 22 feels like a crossroads, but I'm excited for what's next, even if it's uncertain.

So, I'm officially 22 now. Feeling older, but in a good way. The quant job is challenging, but I'm learning so much. $XVI's still a mystery, but it's exciting to be part of something potentially huge. Here's to growth and new adventures!
Today, I'm joining the quant firm. AI Pair Programming has been a game-changer for my coding. Feeling both nervous and exhilarated about trading $XVI with real data now. Here we go!
Got my first paycheck from the quant firm. It feels surreal. Also, started a small $XVI trading experiment. It's like playing with fire, but the heat's exciting. Maybe I'll share my results soon.
